name: CP_2_4_Render_externally_sourced_Clinical_Images
title: CP.2.4 Render externally-sourced Clinical Images (Function)
description: Render clinical images that has been captured from multiple external sources.
purpose: Clinical Images relevant to the patient record can be captured from many external sources and should be rendered appropriately alongside other information in the patient record.

statement.label: CP.2.4#01
statement.requirement: IF the system conforms to function [[CPS.2.4]] (Support externally-sourced Clinical Images), THEN the system SHALL provide the ability to render externally-sourced clinical images.
